data.text: it can't be touched, it can't be developed on --

data.text: just because it makes it easier for them to landscape.

translation.text: Gia đình có thể đến đây; họ có thể xa xỉ trong tự nhiên;

data.text: They offer dedicated green space in both urban and rural areas.

data.text: Will changing the way we bury our dead solve climate change?
